alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Scott (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 7:13PM CDT until July 10 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dakota County in east central Minnesota... East central Scott County in east central Minnesota... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 713 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Prior Lake, or 19 miles south of Minneapolis, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Burnsville around 720 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lakeville, Apple Valley and Farmington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
